titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller Family papers, Home Movies FA1303

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2019-01-26 00:07:26 -0500.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family papers, Home Movies

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains films created by Rockefeller family members.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: John D. Rockefeller Sr. home movies between 1924-1929. Types of records include: films

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Hosting at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting at The Casements: Guests exit house; John D. Rockefeller Sr. exits house; addresses camera; greets guests on lawn. Greetings are repeated three times.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Playing Golf

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D Rockefeller golfing: Group golfs wide; John D. Rockefeller Sr. putts; hands caddies dimes; pan course; John D. Rockefeller Sr. shakes hands; group gets in cars, drive off.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: 18 frames per second. Primary source: AV 1355.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting at The Casements: Three different occasions - John D. Rockefeller Sr. greets guests by tree; John D. Rockefeller Sr. and guests exit and get in car. (Action repeated twice.)

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 85th Birthday

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 85th birthday: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and guests putt golf balls on lawn; sit on terrace; walk through Kykuit gardens; man sets up radio.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Orange Grove

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Orange Grove: John D. Rockefeller Sr. walks in, picks orange; tastes orange with man; given sapling by a younger man.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 86th Birthday

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s 86th Birthday: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and guests sit by terrace; putt on lawn; John D. Rockefeller Sr. sits; addresses camera standing.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Visits His Childhood Homes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York State. John D. Rockefeller Sr. and daughters travel to his childhood homes in Richford, Owego, and Moravia; cemetery; parade; airshow; Bear Mountain Bridge; return to Kykuit.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: 18 frames per second. Primary source: AV 1354.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Golfing on the Lakewood Estate

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lakewood, NJ. John D. Rockefeller Sr. golfing on the Lakewood Estate: Shot of house; John D. Rockefeller Sr. walks with caddy; various wide and medium shots of golfing.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Others Visit Pelican Island

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Sebastian, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, David Rockefeller and others visit Pelican Island: Group boards boats; trip to island; close-ups of pelicans; wide shots of island.

did.unittitle: Young Woman with Dog in Pocantico Hills, New York

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Young woman with dog in farm-like setting.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Hosting Will Rogers at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting Will Rogers at The Casements: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Will Rogers exit house; golf with a small group.

did.unittitle: Rockefellers in Ormond Beach

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Ormond Union Church; views of Ormond Beach Hotel. John D. Rockefeller Sr.: with boy scouts, with a group at country club, golfing, and on mule cart. A costumed chariot race; John D. Rockefeller Jr. on horseback.
At Casements: John D. Rockefeller Sr. on cart; butler; yard workers; dogs; David Rockefeller on bike; John D. Rockefeller Sr. passing dimes in park; Ormond Garage race car; beach and landscape shots

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. in St Augustine
did.physdesc: 18 frames per second. Primary source: AV 1375, AV 1358

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: St. Augustine, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. in St Augustine on various occasions: alone and with Abby Aldrich Rockefeller and group; Old mill; group outside hotel, watch parade and band.

John D. Rockefeller Sr. alone at Castillo de San Marcos; Henry Flagler Memorial; giving dimes to men. View of swamp; Bridge of Lions; group at Castillo; John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Henry M. Flagler statue; shots of burning sugar cane fields.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Visited by Osers

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lakewood, NJ. John D. Rockefeller Sr. is visted by granddaughter Mathilde McCormick Oser, Max Oser and children Anita and Peter outside of Golf House.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. Golfing with Small Group

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Lakewood, NJ. John D. Rockefeller Sr. golfing with small group; sheep graze on lawn of Golf House; golfing party; unknown house; blimp in sky.

did.unittitle: Alta Prentice at her Mount Hope Farm

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Williamstown, MA. John D. Rockefeller Sr.'s daughter Alta Prentice at her Mount Hope Farm. John D. Rockefeller Sr. at chicken coop in different location - possibly Pocantico or Lakewood.

did.unittitle: Compilation of Shots from Pocantico Hills, New York.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Miscellaneous compilation: John D. Rockefeller Sr. walks by wooded construction site. At Kykuit: women in garden; horse drawn wagons; parked cars.

did.unittitle: New Croton Dam in Croton-on-Hudson, New York

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Views of New Croton Dam in Croton-on-Hudson, NY. (No images of Rockefeller family members.)

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at the Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at the Casements. He exits house and walks to camera; sits by Halifax River; on ornamental bridge; feeds bird; enters house.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. at Ormond Beach Train Station

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. gives dimes to children; exits car; with crowds on platform; listens to band; boards train.

did.unittitle: Tea at the Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL: John D. Rockefeller Sr. hosting John D. Rockefeller, Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, and others for tea at The Casements. Guests arrive; servants; tea on terrace; reception line; pose on lawn.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Jr. Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: John D. Rockefeller Jr. home movies between 1917-1946. Types of records include: films.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Children at 10 West 54th Street – Filmed by Koshiba

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Rockefeller Children at 10 West 54th Street – filmed by Koshiba: Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller with book; Nelson Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, John D. Rockefeller III with toys and book; Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller ride toy hand cars in solarium, Laurance Rockefeller fixes wheel.

did.unittitle: David Rockefeller at 10 West 54th Street – Filmed by Koshiba

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. David Rockefeller at 10 West 54th Street – filmed by Koshiba: David Rockefeller with flowers, hobby horse, blocks, and book.

did.unittitle: School Pageant at The Lincoln School

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. School pageant at The Lincoln School - 646 Park Avenue; Children shop, buy ticket, form train, farm, milk cow and garden.

did.unittitle: Science Demonstration at The Lincoln School

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Science demonstration at The Lincoln School - 646 Park Avenue: Man blows glass, works gas-discharge lamp apparatus.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part I: John D. Rockefeller III, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller and David Rockefeller enter with bunnies, joined by Abby Aldrich Rockefeller; single medium shots of John D. Rockefeller III, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, and Winthrop Rockefeller.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part II

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part II: John D. Rockefeller III, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller and David Rockefeller leave Abeyton Lodge riding bicycles; David Rockefeller rides tricycle, plays with dog, David Rockefeller close-ups on trike near Abeyton.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part III

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part III: Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, and five brothers say goodbyes to John D. Rockefeller Jr. in front of Abeyton Lodge; John D. Rockefeller Jr. drives off in a carriage; Abby Aldrich Rockefeller and David Rockefeller watch Abby "Babs" Rockefeller drive off from Abeyton in a car – with unedited takes

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part IV

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part IV: Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and David Rockefeller ride horses on the grounds with Joe Plick.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part V

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Rockefeller Family at Pocantico - Part V: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and John D. Rockefeller III golf on the grounds; pan of Kykuit from below.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family Trip to France

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Atlantic crossings, various France locations. Family Trip to France: on ship – Nelson Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, and John D. Rockefeller III play games; French villages; David Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller row boat; with goats; David Rockefeller catches bugs at Fontainebleau; Versailles; return voyage – Nelson Rockefeller with girl, Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller play games; views of NYC harbor and skyline.

did.unittitle: Reims Cathedral

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Reims, France. Reims Cathedral undergoing restoration; Views from tower and roof of work in progress on Cathedral.

did.unittitle: Young Men Hiking in Yosemite

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Western US. Three unidentified young men hiking in Yosemite; shots of waterfall; unidentified younger children play in stream.

did.unittitle: Teenage Group Playing in Maine

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Maine. Unidentified teenage group pillow fight on lawn, ride tree swing, wrestle, toss ball; group swims in lake, uses canoe and motorboat.

did.unittitle: Christmas Morning at The Casements

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. Christmas morning at The Casements: John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton, Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Nelson Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and John D. Rockefeller III open Christmas gifts.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family at Playhouse on Easter Sunday

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Family at Playhouse on Easter Sunday (filmed with three different cameras): John D. Rockefeller Sr., John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, John D. Rockefeller III, Nelson A. Rockefeller, Mary T. Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, David Rockefeler, and others at Union Church; arrive at Playhouse, play croquet, sit on terrace, leave Playhouse; arrive at Abeyton Lodge.

did.unittitle: Winthrop Rockefeller and Friends

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Teenage Winthrop Rockefeller and group of friends drive around Kykuit and Abeyton Lodge in Model T; clown around at wishing well.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller, Mary T. Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and Friends in Pocantico Hills

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Nelson A. Rockefeller, Mary T. Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, and a group of friends drive Model T; arrive at Abeyton Lodge; drive to Playhouse; swim in indoor pool.

did.unittitle: Family at Pocantico Hills

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Family scenes: Nelson A. Rockefeller and Mary Rockefeller say goodbye to Abby Aldrich Rockefeller and Winthrop Rockefeller on porch of Abeyton Lodge; drive off in Mercury convertible to Playhouse.

did.unittitle: Princeton, Yale, and Cornell Track Meet at Palmer Stadium

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Princeton, NJ. Princeton, Yale, and Cornell track meet at Palmer Stadium: Shots of various track and field events, some in slow motion. (Filmed by Winthrop Rockefeller, who attended Yale 1931-34.)

did.unittitle: Scenes of Mr. and Mrs. John D. Rockefeller Jr. at Bassett Hall

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Williamsburg, VA. Scenes of Mr. and Mrs. Rockefeller Jr. at Bassett Hall: Jphn D. Rockefeller Jr. and Abby Aldrich Rockefeller have tea in garden; Abby knits scarf for war effort; John D. Rockefeller reviews blueprints with Kenneth Chorley and William Perry.

did.unittitle: The Eyrie Garden

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. The Eyrie Garden: Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, John D. Rockefeller Jr., and Winthrop Rockefeller (in uniform) walk through garden, sit on benches.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller home movies between 1928-1934. Types of records include: films.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller with Newborn Mitzi

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller with newborn Mitzi: In crib; giving bottle; on bed.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Family Poses for Koshiba Portraits with Baby Mitzi

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Family poses for Koshiba portraits with baby Mitzi: John D. Rockefeller Sr., John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton, and Abby "Mitzi" Milton.

did.unittitle: At One Beekman Place

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton and baby Mitzi at One Beekman Place: Mitzi in playpen; crib; highchair; fed by Babs.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: 18 frames per second. Primary source: AV 65.

did.unittitle: At the Home of David Hunter McAlpin III

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Princeton, NJ. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton - at the home of David Hunter McAlpin III: with McAlpin family on terrace; in car; playing with kids on lawn.

did.unittitle: At the Home of Mrs. Ellen Hunt Milton

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Oyster Bay, NY. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton - at the home of Mrs. Ellen Hunt Milton: with Wallace and Ellen Milton Harrison by house; swimming in lake.

did.unittitle: At the Home of George and Margaret Strong de Cuevas

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Westbury, NY. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller at the home of George and Margaret Strong de Cuevas: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, Margaret Strong de Cuevas, and daughter Bessie in sun room.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Mitzi on Golf Course

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tarrytown, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Mitzi on golf course: John D. Rockefeller Sr. golfs with group; Mitzi plays with club; car arrives for Senior.

did.unittitle: David Rockefeller and Mitzi at Kykuit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. David Rockefeller and Mitzi at Kykuit: play at sheep barn; Japanese lake; Mitzi rides pony Rastus with Joe Plick.

did.unittitle: Mitzi at Kykuit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mitzi at Kykuit: swims in fountain; plays on lawn; people (staff?) exit frame house.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Mitzi at Kykuit

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Sr. and Mitzi at Kykuit: exchange flower; sit on bench; golf; view from Kykuit; Mitzi in pram; plays with doll; on lawn.

did.unittitle: Mitzi and Scenes From One Beekman Place

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi on terrace, plays with doll; carriage; pail and shovel; statue; views of East River; building dock; Manhattan's East 40's.

did.unittitle: Mitzi Picking Berries and with Baby Marilyn

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Mitzi picking berries; Mitzi and Babs with baby Marilyn (7 weeks old).

did.unittitle: Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton, and Mitzi in Seal Harbor

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. DM, Mitzi on dock; sailing; Babs, DM, Mitzi picnic on rocks.

did.unittitle: At Abeyton Lodge

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, Mitzi, baby Marilyn (3 months old) on Abeyton Lodge porch; John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, and Mitzi depart Abeyton in pony cart.

did.unittitle: Family at Playhouse and Driving Cars

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton, John D. Rockefeller III, Nelson Rockefeller, Mary Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, and Mitzi at Playhouse. Mitzi andAbby Aldrich Rockefeller arrive; family drives cars around circle: parking lot.

did.unittitle: Family at Playhouse and Abeyton Lodge

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. John D. Rockefeller Jr., Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton, John D. Rockefeller III, Nelson Rockefeller, Mary Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, Winthrop Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, and Mitzi at Playhouse and Abeyton Lodge; croquet; on porch; on bikes; by wishing well.

did.unittitle: Summer in Seal Harbor I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. David Milton, Mitzi sailing; David Milton, Mitzi and Marilyn with Abby Aldrich Rockefeller on boat; Abby Aldrich Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, David Milton, Mitzi and Marilyn picnic on Sutton Island.

did.unittitle: Summer in Seal Harbor II

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton, Mitzi fishing from sail boat; Mitzi amd Marilyn at Seal Harbor Club kiddie pool; Abby "Babs" Rockefeller on Wabenaki home balcony.

did.unittitle: Family Playing on Ormond Beach

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Ormond Beach, FL. Nelson Rockefeller, Laurance Rockefeller, David Rockefeller, David Milton dig in sand; David Rockefeller, Babs, David Milton, Nelson Rockefeller in ocean; Nelson Rockefeller, Mary Rockefeller, Abby "Babs" Rockefeller, David Milton, and lifeguard bury David Rockefeller in the sand.

did.unittitle: Mitzi, Marilyn, and Scenes From One Beekman Place

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi and Marilyn on terrace; tumble; play with watering can and statue; East River views; at building's playground.

did.unittitle: Mitzi and Marilyn

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: Mitzi does acrobatics in apartment; Mitzi and Marilyn sit on terrace bench.

did.unittitle: Milton Home - Pocantico Hills, NY

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: David MiltonM, Mitzi and Marilyn on go-kart; girls feed chickens; feed dogs and cats; play on lawn.

did.unittitle: Mitzi and Marilyn Dancing

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. One Beekman Place: in apartment Mitzi tap dances; does acrobatics; East River and Welfare Island views; Mitzi and Marilyn sit by terrace statue.

did.unittitle: Milton Family Outside in Pocantico Hills, New York - I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: Mitzi and Marilyn feed chickens; Mitzi at beehive; girls play on haystack; David Milton, Mitzi on lake raft; Marilyn on sand.

did.unittitle: Milton Family Outside in Pocantico Hills, New York - II

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Milton Home: Mitzi and Marilyn wade in pool; girls play with dog; Babs, David Milton, Mitzi and Marilyn fish off footbridge; play with cats.

did.unittitle: "Looney Tunes by Babs"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Various locations. "Looney Tunes by Babs" - Milton Family film compilation. Edited by Abby Rockefeller Mauze and Mitzi O'Neill, c. 1960.

did.unittitle: Head and Tail cards for "Looney Tunes by Babs"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Head and Tail cards for the "Looney Tunes by Babs" compilation. B and O Film Effects.

did.unittitle: Laurance S. Rockefeller Family Home Movies

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Laurance S. Rockefeller home movies circa 1935-1955. Types of records include: films.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: When requesting to view audiovisual material, please refer to the Title and the AV Number (example: AV 1916). Researchers are asked to check the "Restrictions" note for each Title. If a Title does not currently have an access copy, please contact a RAC archivist for further instruction.

All inquiries to view films require advanced notice of at least 2 business days, and may necessitate notice of up to one week. Individual items, including those that are not available in modern formats, may be restricted from access at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mary French Rockefeller walks around site of house under construction; plays with dog.

scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Mary French Rockefeller and Laura in Central Park: In carriage; walking with pull toy; on bench with Mary French Rockefeller and doll.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller and Laura in Central Park - II

did.unittitle: Laura Rockefeller Playing

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Laura Rockefeller plays on lawn while nanny watches. In sandbox; on slide; with wheelbarrow.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller and Laura on Kykuit Lawn

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Pregnant Mary French Rockefeller and Laura on lawn at Kykuit: by gazebo; by pond; on slide; with donkey.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller with Newborn Marion in Hospital
did.physdesc: Silent, Color and Black and white, 2 minutes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: New York, NY. Mary French Rockefeller with newborn Marion in hospital. Marion in crib; held by Mary sitting in chair.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller, Laura, and Baby Marion

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mary French Rockefeller with Laura and baby Marion: watering trees in backyard; sitting together by rock garden.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller, Laura, and Baby Marion at Kykuit - I

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY.: Mary French Rockefeller, Laura, and baby Marion at Kykuit: Marion in playpen, Laura on tricycle; Mary and girls play at edge of fountain.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller, Laura, and Baby Marion at Kykuit - II

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements
phystech.p: Color drops out momentarily due to repair using black and white footage.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Mary French Rockefeller with Laura and baby Marion at Kykuit: Mary arranges blanket, sits with girls and nine other cousins.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller Aboard the Motorboat "Sea Beast"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Tarrytown, NY. Mary French Rockefeller boards and cruises the Hudson River in the motorboat "Sea Beast."

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller and Laura with Horses

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Pony cart arrives; Mary French Rockefeller with horse; Laura rides pony with Joe Plick; brief shot of Laurance Rockefeller's house.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller, Laura, and Marion at Seal Harbor

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Mary French Rockefeller, Laura and Marion arrive at house; at beach - girls on blanket with Mary; play in sand with sticks.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller, Laura and Marion at Seal Harbor Club

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Mary French Rockefeller, Laura, and Marion at Seal Harbor Club: Mary sun bathes on deck; with girls in kiddie pool.

did.unittitle: Abby Aldrich Rockefeller at Kykuit with Cousins

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Potantico Hills, NY. Abby Aldrich Rockefeller with cousins dressed in Wild West costumes: riding ponies; group gathered on lawn at Kykuit.

did.unittitle: Laurance "Larry" Rockefeller Jr. at Seal Harbor

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Seal Harbor, ME. Laurance "Larry" Rockefeller Jr.: at children's party; with toy boat, walking down to shore with Laura and Marion; on dock; random shots of sailboats.

did.unittitle: Horse Show
did.physdesc: Silent, Color and Black and white, 5 minutes

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Pocantico Hills, NY. Horse Show: Mary French Rockefeller, Laura, Marion and other cousins ride; carriages; cousins on horseback dressed in various costumes.

did.unittitle: Mary French Rockefeller on Motorboat "Dauntless"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Fishers Island, NY. Mary French Rockefeller with a group aboard the motorboat "Dauntless." Shots of sail boats; yacht club; pulling into dock.

did.unittitle: Golf Practice

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Amagansett, ME. Mary French Rockefeller, Marion, and man practice golf swing.

did.unittitle: John D. Rockefeller 3rd with Lucy and Marion Rockefeller on Fishers Island, New York

scopecontent.p: Fishers Island, NY. John D. Rockefeller 3rd with a group in row boat; shots of Lucy on "Dauntless;" views of shore; sail boats; Marion boards "Dauntless" from row boat.

did.unittitle: Margaretta "Happy" Rockefeller Childhood Home Movies
